scripts.format: shopt -s extglob globstar && prettier --config ./.prettierrc.json -c --write ./src/**/*.ts* && shopt -u extglob globstar
scripts.start: { [ "$PORT" ] || PORT=1234; } && { [ "$SERVER" ] || { echo 'SERVER not defined!' && exit 1; }; } && { [ "$PROXY" ] && PROXY=1 PROXY_OPT="--proxy $SERVER" || PROXY=0; } && echo "PORT: $PORT, SERVER: $SERVER, PROXY: $PROXY" && npm run build && http-server -p "$PORT" $PROXY_OPT -- ./dist/build
scripts.start:dev: { [ "$PORT" ] || PORT=1234; } && { [ "$SERVER" ] || { echo 'SERVER not defined!' && exit 1; }; } && { [ "$PROXY" ] && { echo 'PROXY not supported in dev server' && exit 1; } || true; } && echo "PORT: $PORT. SERVER: $SERVER, proxy not supported" && parcel serve --no-cache -d ./dist/ -p "$PORT" -- "$npm_package_main"
